text: Gei Moses ga duudagi adu ana helekai boloo, “Ma go Dimaadua dela ga gowadu godou goneiga manu e gai go goodou i nia hiahi huogodoo, gei nia palaawaa e logo be di godou hiihai i nia luada huogodoo, i Mee gu longono Ia di godou tamu Ia. Idimaa hagalee go gimaua ala ne tamu go goodou, ma go Dimaadua.”
